title: Adiye Enna Raagam Lyrics Rummy Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Adiye Enna Raagam
Singer(s): Abhay Jodhpurkar, Poornima Satish
Movie: Rummy
Music: D Imman
Lyrics: Yugabharathi

Adiye enna raagam neeyum paadura
azhagaa ulla poondhu saami aadura
vakkanayaa paakkura
vambugala koottura
sakkraya aadham pol ootura
enna ne yaeni mela yethura yethura

Adiye enna raagam neeyum paadura
azhagaa neeyum poodhu saami aadura

Idhuvara ippadi illa
kodukura rombavum tholla
edhuku ne porandha theriyala
edhukku nee vazhandha puriyala
podhuvaa unna ennai pogudhu en aavi
thonaiya nee illa, naan kattiduven kaavi

Irundhen thanda soraa,
enna nee cutikuraa, pola nee poosura
vaasamaa veesura ..

Adiye enna raagam neeyum paadura
azhagaa ulla poondhu saami aadura

Palaguna nanbana vitten
padipayum pattunu vitten
adikadi theruva paakuren
varuvenu vazhiya paakuren
thaniyaa naanum kooda katureney paatu
mulusaa unnaala naan aanen pulla theetu

Pasiyo mangi pochu
padukka thalli pochu
kaaranam neeyadi thookkava kaavadi

Adiye enna raagam
Adiye enna raagam neeyum paadura
azhagaa ulla poondhu saami aadura
vakkanayaa paakkura
vambugala koottura
sakkraya aadham pol ootura
enna ne yaeni mela yethura yethura
